channel.title: Need help connecting 718 rsps client to my source!
channel.description: can anyone help me connect my client to my source. when i run my client its stuck at 0% all my ips are set to local 127.0.0.1 so thats not the problem. my skype is purecoolbow1

yes of course, can you message me on skype please? @purecoolbow1

item.title: Need help connecting 718 rsps client to my source!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Are you running the source before the client? 718 clients have to connect to the server to work.
